name: Cryozia
description:
On your yearly sabbatical to the Mahabo galaxy a rogue magnetic disturbance sends your habitat pod to a dangerous region of the ludum-verse. Here planets rich with crystals contiuously pop in and out of existence. Many have sought there fortune here and never returned, your goal is more prosaic... to get home alive. You set out on your hover pad to collect enough crystals to teleport your habitat pod to another planet and with a little luck home...

Controls:  Arrow keys or A, D, W

Made for Ludum Dare 39 by Tim Cox
